SentimentText: A) What a joker you are. European parliament has no power to do anything. This is not a place for you to get your 'revenge'. Go and edit the golden dawn wikipedia because your ideas will only be welcome there.

B) OOOOHHHH With a big long Intellectually Terrifying and Superior name like "(referenced to Journal of Labelled Compounds and Radiopharmaceuticals)". How Could the quote be wrong Hey!!
